getStudyDesignById

public Study getStudyDesignById(int id)
//TODO - Refactor this code with Hibernate Detached objects !!!

This is a hack to load all collection objects in memory. Useful for editing a Study when you know you will be needing all collections To avoid Lazy loading Exception by Hibernate, a call to .size() is done for each collection

Parameters:
id -
Returns:
Fully loaded Study

getByShortTitle

public Study getByShortTitle(java.lang.String shortTitle)
